About me

Hi, I’m Chris. I hold a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of the Witwatersrand and I’m currently pursuing a Masters of Science in Electrical Engineering at the same university focusing on data analytics.

I work at the University of the Witwatersrand where I’m a Graduate Business Intelligence Engineer focusing on data warehousing, ETL, reporting and data analytics. In the past I’ve worked as a Software Developer at Infoware Studios, University of the Witwatesrand, Hyperion Development South Africa and Joburg Centre for Software Engineering where I developed and mantained bespoke software. You can visit my Linkedin profile for more information.

I have a diverse set of skills ranging from software design, testing, development (Android, C++, Java, Rails, etc), agile practices, data warehousing, analytics, reporting, OBIEE, ODI, SAP BO, Tableau, Qlikview, Linux server administration to electronics.

I enjoy volunteering, hiking, photography and learning new things.

  • Hyperion Teaching Project
  • Wits Energy Metering Project
